name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Introduction to Aerodynamics
lessons.description: Overview of aerodynamic principles and applications.

lessons.name: Basic Fluid Mechanics
lessons.description: Fundamental concepts of fluid properties, flow, and behavior.

lessons.name: Aerodynamic Forces and Moments
lessons.description: Analysis of lift, drag, and moment forces on bodies in motion.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Introduction to Subsonic Flow
lessons.description: Overview of the differences between subsonic, transonic, and supersonic flow regimes.

lessons.name: Basic Fluid Properties
lessons.description: Fundamental concepts of Density, viscosity, and temperature effects on subsonic flow.

lessons.name: Bernoulli’s Principle
lessons.description: Understanding Bernoulli’s equation in subsonic flow..

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Introduction to Aerodynamic Heating
lessons.description: Overview of applications in aerospace, particularly in re-entry vehicles and high-speed aircraft.

lessons.name: Basic Principles of Heat Transfer
lessons.description: The role of heat transfer mechanisms in high-speed flight.

lessons.name: Fluid Dynamics and Heating
lessons.description: Understanding the relationship between airflow speed, pressure, and temperature.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Introduction to Aerodynamics
lessons.description: Overview of aerodynamic principles and applications.

lessons.name: Basic Fluid Mechanics
lessons.description: Fundamental concepts of fluid properties, flow, and behavior.

lessons.name: Aerodynamic Forces and Moments
lessons.description: Analysis of lift, drag, and moment forces on bodies in motion.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Introduction to Orbital Mechanics
lessons.description: Overview of the field and its significance in space exploration and satellite technology.

lessons.name: The Two-Body Problem
lessons.description: Analyzing the motion of two bodies under mutual gravitational attraction.

lessons.name: Newton’s Laws of Motion and Universal Gravitation
lessons.description: Understanding Newton’s laws as they apply to orbital motion.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Introduction to Spacecraft Systems Engineering
lessons.description: Overview of spacecraft systems engineering and its role in space missions.

lessons.name: Systems Engineering Process
lessons.description: Understanding the systems engineering lifecycle: requirements analysis, design, implementation, testing, and verification.

lessons.name: Requirements Definition and Management
lessons.description: Techniques for validating and verifying requirements throughout the project.
